definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: The beautiful mark in the blue sky, as well as in my memory.
sentences.chinese: 飛機劃破藍空，也在我的記憶中留下印痕。
他給自己的馬匹烙上了印痕。

sentences.english: The dimension of contact region is measured by means of stamp method.
sentences.chinese: 接觸區尺寸採用印痕法測量。

sentences.english: It is the mark of life.
Like K D Lang's celebrated song Trail of Broken Hearts.
sentences.chinese: 朗那首耳熟能詳的歌曲《心碎印痕》所唱的那樣。

sentences.english: The past left deep prints on him.
sentences.chinese: 過去在他身上留下了深深的印痕。

sentences.english: Use chromatic way to check imprints of gear flanks.
sentences.chinese: 齒面接觸印痕的檢查是用着色法檢查。

sentences.english: The past left deep print on him.
sentences.chinese: 過去在他身上留下了深深的印痕。

sentences.english: The impression is used to choose the right fishing tool to remove the fish.
sentences.chinese: 印痕用來選擇正確的打撈工具以取出落魚。

sentences.english: Rotate gear for several rounds, and the imprints left on the small bevel gear surface are touch imprints.
sentences.chinese: 此時粘印到小錐齒輪面上的印痕即爲接觸印痕。

sentences.english: Rotate gear for several rounds, and the imprints left on the small bevel gear surface are touch imprints.
sentences.chinese: 此時粘印到小錐齒輪面上的印痕即爲接觸印痕。

sentences.english: The well-printed book has a sharp, clean impression.
sentences.chinese: 印刷良好的書籍有明顯而清楚的印痕。

sentences.english: She took the pillow up, holding it as if reluctant to shake out the impress of his cheek.
sentences.chinese: 她捧起枕頭，端看，好象捨不得抖掉他那臉頰的印痕。

sentences.english: The last one is the diagenesis of limestone and mud, which superimposed on the imprint.
sentences.chinese: 三是灰泥和泥質物成巖壓實作用，疊加在印痕上。

definition: trace/impression (e.g. footprint)/abbr. of 印子錢|印子钱[yin4 zi5 qian2], usury
